msbt.message: It's crazy fun visiting the tailors and trying things on. I love wearing clothes that don't belong to me!
I'm studying fashion right now!<10_4 /> At least, that's what I'm saying I'm doing. For tax purposes.
Ah! Look at you! I am sooo into your style, I could pop! We have to wear matching outfits sometime!

'K. Here's a key fashion tip, my fab bestieYou see clothes? You love clothes? You do NOT buy clothes until you've tried on clothes, .You don't want to get home and be all, "Why'd I buy a sequined yellow velvet bodysuit with a cape?"Not that I'm speaking from experience.

Hi there, ! Find something you like?My personal rule for when I find something cute is to buy it PRONTO!See, I spend my Bells with as little thought as possible, so I never have to ask myself, "What was I thinking?"
You loving the fashion scene?Everybody here is into, well, pretty much everything, so you'll always fit in!
It can be way hard to buy clothes as a gift. No worries, though! Everything here's so chic you can't go wrong! If somebody bought me stuff from here, I'd be so happy I'd scream!
Hi! You here to see the brand-new tailors too, ?The display is legit, the designs melt my eyes, and I need two ofeverything. STAT.My wallet's in full-on crisis mode, !

I'm usually the source of breaking fashion news, but the new tailors is what's breaking news right now!Like, the news that just broke? You pronounce "chic" like "sheek"and not like "shish"!I wish someone had told me sooner.
I'm sooo crazy thankful we have a tailors on what used to be a deserted island.It's, like, sure, we have running water, electricity, and wasps. But now? We have fashion!I could low-key cry, !
